## Discussion

This value is the largest allowed count of [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/AssetInventory/reservedLocales]. The value may vary between devices according to storage space.

# maximumReservedLocales

**Type Property**

The number of locale reservations permitted to an app.

## Declaration

```swift
static var maximumReservedLocales: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is the largest allowed count of [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/AssetInventory/reservedLocales]. The value may vary between devices according to storage space.
title: maximumReservedLocales
